android.text__markdown:
## We've made the app even ~~better!~~

You can get the latest version from ~~[Google PlayStore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.twentyninek.app.cupcake)~~

ios.text__markdown:
## We've made the app even ~~better!~~

You can get the latest version from ~~[Apple AppStore](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/aware-mindfulness-wellbeing/id1631342681)~~

maintenance.text__markdown:
## We're undergoing a bit of a ~~maintenance~~

Sorry for the inconvenience. We’ll be back up and running as soon as possible.

failed.text__markdown:
## Something’s not quite right...

We’re having some technical difficulties right now. Try again in a moment.

android.text__markdown:

Podes obter a última versão na ~~[Google PlayStore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.twentyninek.app.cupcake)~~

maintenance.text__markdown:
## Estamos em ~~manutenção~~

Desculpa o incómodo. Vamos tentar voltar o mais rapidamente possível.

failed.text__markdown:
## Algo correu mal...

Estamos com algumas dificuldades técnicas. Tenta de novo daqui a pouco.

android.text__markdown:
## Vi har gjort appen ännu ~~bättre!~~

Du kan hämta den senaste versionen från ~~[Google PlayStore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.twentyninek.app.cupcake)~~

ios.text__markdown:

Du kan hämta den senaste versionen från ~~[Apple TestFlight](https://apps.apple.com/se/app/aware-mindfulness-wellbeing/id1631342681)~~

maintenance.text__markdown:
## Vi genomgår lite av ett ~~underhåll~~

Beklagar oredan. Vi kommer att vara igång igen så snart som möjligt.

failed.text__markdown:
## Något stämmer inte riktigt...

 Vi har tekniska problem just nu. Prova igen om en stund.
